summary: Halil who is a painter falls in love with a picture which belongs to a daughter of a mansion's owner. One day, the girl comes into the mansion while Halil is looking at the picture.
cast: Müsfik Kenter|Sema Özcan|Süleyman Tekcan|Oya Bulaner|Abdullah Demiryan|Kemal Ergüvenç|Ayban Erkmen|Fadil Garan|Osman Karahan|Mehmet Omar|Adnan Uygur|Deniz Çakir
title: Sevmek Zamani
